createTime.description: The timestamp for when the place index resource was created in ISO 8601 format.

dataSource.description: Specifies the geospatial data provider for the new place index.

dataSourceConfiguration.description: Configuration block with the data storage option chosen for requesting Places. Detailed below.

description.description: The optional description for the place index resource.

indexArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the place index resource. Used to specify a resource across AWS.

indexName.description:
The name of the place index resource.

The following arguments are optional:

tags.description: Key-value tags for the place index. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

updateTime.description: The timestamp for when the place index resource was last update in ISO 8601.
